thread.title: Beautiful Boutique Hotel -
thread.title_full: Beautiful Boutique Hotel - Review of Hotel Sacha by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Andrew M
title: Beautiful Boutique Hotel -
text:
Hotel Sacha is located in the heart of Paris with lot of attractions and shops around. Beautiful inside and out. As a photographer I had a deep appreciation for the decor throughout the hotel and even used the walls as backdrops for shooting (see photos).
Overall, I would definitely return! This hotel is in a great location and the staff are fantastic, delivering a top quality service in this theatrically themed hotel. Thanks for having us.
See all photos
